content.rendered:
Jake, Thank you for a great experience last week! Everything was a “Home Run” in my book and I left with many great ideas and insights. Wishing all at JCG continued success!!!
Andy Clayton
Wilson St. Pierre Funeral Service
Indianapolis, IN
